remarks: The predicate "is an associative operation".  (Contributed by FL, 1-Nov-2009.)  (Revised by AV, 13-Jan-2020.)
statement:
isasslaw $p |- ( ( .o. e. V /\ M e. W ) -> ( .o. assLaw M <-> A. x e. M A. y e. M A. z e. M ( ( x .o. y ) .o. z ) = ( x .o. ( y .o. z ) ) ) ) $.
$d .o. x y z $.
$d M x y z $.
